virtues.comment: THIS DICT DOES NOTHING - it's purely here for quick reference of some possible virtues, you are not constrained to using these nor should you use these lists
prev_lead_virtues: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
chief rabbitship through the darkest times
the strength to overcome their fears

text: m_c {VERB/m_c/shut/shuts} {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes and {VERB/m_c/are/is} immediately surrounded by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} utter darkness. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} are approached by shadowed rabbits, untouched by the light of Frith and denied a place in Inlé-rah's warren.

As m_c dreams that night, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/find/finds} {PRONOUN/m_c/self} walking through darkness, mud and muck sticking to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws. The world around {PRONOUN/m_c/object} is devoid of light, and bare branches claw at the empty sky above. A single, foreboding rabbit sits within a clearing.

m_c {VERB/m_c/shut/shuts} {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes and {VERB/m_c/are/is} immediately surrounded by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} utter darkness. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} are approached by shadowed rabbits, untouched by the light of Frith and denied a place in Inlé-rah's warren. Triumph gleams in their eyes.

default_blessing.text: r_r leaps forward, eyes flashing. "I grant you [virtue]." {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/say/says}, before disappearing back into the darkness.

life_giving.text: The rabbit stands and stalks towards m_c, circling {PRONOUN/m_c/object} as though a hunter appraising their next meal. "You come here, ignorant to the lands you walk, expecting a gift? A boon? You'll all wallow here in the darkness with me one day," the rabbit's eyes pierce into m_c's pelt, "You'll remember me as r_r, and you'll remember that I've granted you the blessing of [virtue]. And one day, we'll speak again."
virtue: brutality in the face of opposition

life_giving.text: From the muck and mire the distorted shadows of long dead rabbits rise and loom. Red eyes pierce the haze and a harsh thumping grates across the clearing, "Kindly spirit's eyes have left you, so we come to grant your remaining blessings. Do with them what you will," before the shadows are gone as quickly as they appeared.

Despite looking quite out of place among the battle-hardened shadows, r_r still places {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} muzzle harshly against the new chief rabbit's head. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} a blessing of [virtue], hoping that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} will remember {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own kindness.

r_r stalks up to the new chief rabbit, eyes burning with the increasingly familiar lightless ferocity. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/touch/touches} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose to m_c's head, giving {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a blessing for [virtue]. m_c reels back with the emotion of the emotions that course through them.

r_r jovially jaunts up to the new chief rabbit. The dark murk on {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} fur or the red eyes did not seem to dampen {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} spirit one bit. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/touch/touches} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose to m_c's head, giving {PRONOUN/m_c/object} the blessing of [virtue]. When m_c looks up, r_r is walking away from the scene in high spirits.
virtue: seeing the brighter side of a dark situation
daring to do what must be done

life_giving.text: r_r seemed to appear to m_c out of nowhere in the shadowy gloom of the the lightless lands, and quietly gives {PRONOUN/m_c/object} the blessing of [virtue]. As quickly as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} appeared, r_r vanished when the blessing was given.
virtue: caution in the heat of battle
the strength to carry on alone

Another rabbit approaches. r_r steps forward to give m_c the blessing of [virtue]. m_c grits {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} teeth as the blessing rushes into {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

r_r grinds a raspy greeting. Energy surges through m_c's pelt as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/receive/receives} the blessing of [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/spit/spits} at m_c that {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pain is almost over.

r_r walks up to m_c next, giving {PRONOUN/m_c/object} the blessing of [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/growl/growls} a word of encouragement over the destruction of c_n's enemies before returning to the line of shadows.
Another rabbit approaches. r_r steps forward to give m_c the blessing of [virtue]. m_c squeals in pain as the blessing rushes into {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
r_r approaches. Pain surges through m_c's pelt as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/receive/receives} the blessing of [virtue]. r_r watches with no sympathy, grunting to live with the wounds earned.

r_r narrows {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} eyes as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} stalk up to m_c. After a cryptic warning to keep {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own warren, rather than the horizons, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/receive/receives} the blessing of [virtue].
r_r places {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} muzzle against m_c, giving a harsh blessing for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/leave/leaves} with a whisper that the borders are not to be trusted.

r_r approaches next and growls under {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} breath about the soft-hearted bunnies stalking around the borders. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} the blessing of [virtue] and hurriedly steps away.
With a taunting laugh, r_r approaches and gives m_c the blessing of [virtue]. r_r asks if {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ambition to lead the warren was worth the pain, but leaves before m_c could answer.

There is a proud gleam in r_r's eyes as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/approach/approaches} the new chief rabbit. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/give/gives} the blessing of [virtue], and encouragement to raise m_c's ambitions even higher than the stars themselves.

r_r steps up to the new chief rabbit with a chilling grin stretching {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} maw apart. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} m_c the blessing of [virtue], encouraging m_c to boldly do what no sun-loving rabbit could never dare to try.

r_r bares {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} teeth and looks like {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/are/is} about to fight m_c. But r_r only presses {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose against m_c and snarls the blessing of [virtue].

r_r's eerie composture approaches, {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} calmness tinged with a malevolent presence. {PRONOUN/r_r/poss/CAP} cool fasade gleams at m_c, as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/extend/extends} an offer of a blessing, infused with the virtue of [virtue].

r_r stepped forth with hypnotic grace, {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} presence pulling the very air into a hushed stillness. r_r moved forward with deliberate precision, a testament to {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} innate awareness, like a predator stalking its prey with relentless focus. r_r chokes out a bitter laugh, taunting the new chief rabbit about if {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} honeyed words can help {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in a real fight. r_r presses {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose against m_c's head and sneers out the blessing of [virtue].

r_r could not help but praise m_c as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/approach/approaches} {PRONOUN/m_c/object}. Encouraging the use of m_c's silver tongue and barbed threats, the dark spirit gives the blessing of [virtue].

Slinking across the ground to close the distance between them, r_r grins like {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/were/was} watching a tiny, trapped kit. r_r gives m_c the blessing of [virtue], vanishing before that maw could strike at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} throat.
r_r wanted to claw the silly smile right off of m_c's face. Instead, {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} made sure that {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} blessing for [virtue] is as painful as possible.

Staring coldly from the murk, r_r prowls towards m_c and shoves {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into the dark goo surrounding them both. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/growl/growls} out {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} blessing for [virtue], demanding that m_c stop treating everything like a game.

r_r bounds up to the new chief rabbit with a wicked grin. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/place/places} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose against m_c's head, jabbering quickly on about the blessing of [virtue] before asking what m_c's favorite game is. Draped in an aura of chilling indifference, r_r slinked forward with stoic grace, {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} measured steps reverberating with an unsettling stillness that sent shivers down m_c's spine. Closing the haunting distance between them, r_r inches closer, extending an offer of a blessing in name of [virtue].

r_r approaches, {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} feral grace exuding a calculated composure, concealing the wickedness that thrived within. Yet, amidst the chilling embrace, a surge of blessing coursed through m_c's veins, a vitality nourished by the unwavering virtue of [virtue].

One of the core philosophy of the the lightless lands is that Compassion was a weakness. And as pain arched through m_c's body from r_r's blessing for [virtue], that harsh lesson burned through {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} body like a raging inferno.

A sneer crossed r_r's face as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/approach/approaches} m_c. r_r's tired gaze watches m_c. Whispering how m_c's compassionate nature will only hurt c_n in the end, r_r presses {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose against the new chief rabbit and sighs out the blessing of [virtue].
Overconfidence can blind even the most loyal of Inle-loving rabbits. And that was just what r_r was counting on as the cruel blessing of [virtue] burned through m_c's mind.
r_r whispered sweetly for m_c to deafen {PRONOUN/m_c/self} from the cowardly, cautious cries of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} warren as the dark spirit gives the blessing of [virtue].

r_r meets m_c's eyes with a smirk, sliding through the murk like a claw through freshkill to give the blessing of [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/hiss/hisses} quiet praise to m_c's more reckless tendencies, encouraging the new chief rabbit to think with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws, not {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head.

Suddenly, r_r lunges, stopping {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} claws a whisker before m_c's face. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/laugh/laughs} sharply when {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/realize/realizes} m_c had moved to retaliate, even surrounded by the oppressive murk, and {VERB/r_r/touch/touches} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} claws to m_c's throat to bestow the blessing of [virtue] before leaving as suddenly as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} appeared.

r_r locks eyes with m_c through the darkness before striding forward, shadows and goop sticking strongly to {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} fur. m_c is the one who initiates the nose-touch, though r_r doesn't so much as blink, allowing the blessing of [virtue] to flow into m_c with a fanged grin.

r_r laughs at poor, pious m_c, so out of place in the gloom of the forest, and gives the blessing of [virtue]. As m_c staggers in pain, r_r mockingly asks if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} still faithful to Inle, even in this twisted wood, but {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/bound/bounds} away before any answer can be given.

r_r slides {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} tail along m_c's side, asking softly if this is where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} thought {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} faith would bring {PRONOUN/m_c/object}. r_r wastes no time in bestowing {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} blessing of [virtue]. m_c opens {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mouth, perhaps to argue that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/r_r/don't/doesn't} belong here, that {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} faith still lies with Silverpelt, but a single look from the shadowy rabbit quickly wrenches {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mouth shut once more.

r_r's claws dug into the shadowy ooze underneath {PRONOUN/r_r/object} when {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/approach/approaches} m_c. The dark spirit gives the blessing of [virtue]. It feels like the claws of all the foxes in the world are raking down m_c's pelt.
The next dark spirit could not even meet m_c's ferocious gaze. The trembling shadow of r_r hastily gives the blessing of [virtue] before scrambling away from the might of c_n's newest chief rabbit.

r_r croons into m_c's ear, whispering about how now {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}'ll be able to prove everyone in the warren wrong about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} weak-willed mentality. Don't make {PRONOUN/r_r/object} laugh! r_r's howling cackle echoes in m_c's ears as the dark spirit leaves {PRONOUN/m_c/object} behind.

There is a strange softness in r_r's eyes beyond the crimson gloom that shines forth. Smearing muck against m_c's forehead, the spirit whispers the blessing of [virtue]. The the lightless lands might not believe in {PRONOUN/m_c/object} but r_r always will.

r_r slinks forward with an air of unsettling detachment. Rarely does a sound escape {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} lips, as this feline only speaks to hand m_c the blessing of [virtue], then fades into the shadows once more. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/CAP} haunting presence lingers, leaving behind a trail of curiosity and unspoken whispers.

Though lacking words, r_r's presence emanates an unspoken offer of the blessing of m_c, embedded with the virtue of [virtue]. The departure leaves a trail of mystery and reverential awe in r_r's aftermath.

With steady footing, r_r approaches m_c, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} velvet paws treading noiselessly upon the moss-covered ground. r_r dips their head in greeting. Energy surges through m_c's pelt as they receive the blessing of [virtue]. They reassure m_c that they are almost done.

r_r presses {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose against m_c's forehead, the virtue of [virtue] burning away the chief rabbit's previous blessing. Loyalty to {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} warren must be absolute, and no weakness can be tolerated.

A disdainful look crosses r_r's face when it was {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} turn to give the blessing of [virtue]. The lack of a preamble and the violent press of r_r's maw into {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} fur only made m_c more anxious about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new role as chief rabbit.

r_r circles m_c, eyes glittering with amusement. Of course m_c would become chief rabbit, {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/purr/purrs}, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/have/has} nothing to lose! r_r presses against m_c, a blessing given for [virtue] coursing through {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} limbs.

While such antics would be frowned upon by Inle, r_r and the the lightless lands welcome the newest troublemaker with open arms. r_r gives the blessing of [virtue], encouraging m_c to take {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} plots to new heights.

r_r walks up to m_c, offering the blessing of [virtue]. They smile, and state that the warren will do well under m_c's chief rabbitship.

r_r dips their head in greeting. Energy surges through m_c's pelt as they receive the blessing of [virtue]. They reassure m_c that they are almost done.
What does wisdom have in the face of raw power? r_r sneers this in m_c's face as the blessing for [virtue] is given like a claw through the throat.

r_r snarls as the live of [virtue] is given, winding around m_c's body like a snake. All of the new chief rabbit's plans and thoughts will crumble to dust unless {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/acts/act} qucikly, rashly!

m_c was the best of the rabbits in c_n. The best in the whole warren entierly. Maybe even the best rabbit of all of history! That was what r_r crooned into the new chief rabbit's ears as the blessing for [virtue] was given freely.

r_r knows that m_c will never be able to outdo {PRONOUN/r_r/object}, even with the the lightless lands on the chief rabbit's side. Even as the blessing for [virtue] fades into a dull, painful ache, r_r whispers how {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} will be here and watching m_c fail again and again compared to dark spirit.

Such a theatric attitude had no place in the the lightless lands. But the gloom-covered spirit of r_r gives m_c the blessing of [virtue] with silent contempt in {PRONOUN/r_r/poss}  eyes regardless of {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} feelings on the matter.
r_r wondered if m_c's grumpy attitude was from anger and bloodlust, or a general spite towards the world. The shadowy spirit gives the new chief rabbit the blessing of [virtue].
So long as m_c uses {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} rebellious ways to destroy the hold Inle has on the world, r_r couldn't give a rat's tail what the new chief rabbit did with the blessing for [virtue].
Was this a joke? The murk-covered form of r_r couldn't believe that m_c was chosen to be chief rabbit. r_r rolls {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} eyes and gives the blessing of [virtue] with an incredulous sigh.

r_r bounds up to the new chief rabbit, reaching up on {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} hind legs to give {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a new blessing for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/flick/flicks} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} muck-covered tail and {VERB/r_r/run/runs} back to the line of shadows.

r_r giddily approaches the new chief rabbit, reaching up on {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} hind legs to give {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a new blessing for [virtue]. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/lash/lashes} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} tail and head back to make room for the next rabbit.
A rusasi is next to give a blessing. Crimson gloom reflects off {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} youthful eyes. r_r stretches up to give the blessing of [virtue].

A rusasi is next to give a blessing. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/hesitate/hesitates}, before an older rabbit shoves {PRONOUN/r_r/object} forward, growling in {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} ear. r_r stretches up to give the blessing of [virtue].
r_r strides forward, an energy in {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} steps that wasn't present in {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} last moments. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} the blessing of [virtue].
r_r pads forward with a savage expression. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} the blessing of [virtue].

r_r approaches next, a sharp grin on {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} maw. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/offer/offers} the blessing of [virtue], whispering to make sure {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} warren remains strong. No matter the cost.

r_r approaches next, a dark expression on {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} face. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/offer/offers} the blessing of [virtue], whispering to inspire true loyalty through fear of punishment.
Finally, r_r steps forward. The gloom and murk across {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} pelt shows the future that m_c will endure one day. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} the blessing of [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose to lay in wait
chief rabbitship through the darkest times
the strength to overcome their fears

life_giving.text: r_r, one of the the lightless lands's oldest chief rabbits, looks at the new chief rabbit with a triumphant expression. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} a last blessing, the gift of [virtue].

text: r_r hails m_c by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new name, m_c_star, telling {PRONOUN/m_c/object} that {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old pathetic blessing is no more. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/are/is} granted guardianship of c_n, and {VERB/m_c/are/is} told to use {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new power however {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} wish. The group of shadowy rabbits yowls m_c_star's name in support. m_c_star wakes up feeling a new strength within {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} body and know that they are now ready to lead the warren.
m_c_star wakes, a hissing echo of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new name lingering in the air.

r_r hails m_c by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new name, m_c_star, telling {PRONOUN/m_c/object} that {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old pathetic blessing is no more. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/are/is} granted guardianship of c_n, and {VERB/m_c/are/is} told to use {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new power however {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} wish. The the lightless lands's hissing and yowls echo in the dusky clearing as the new chief rabbit begins to wake up. m_c_star stands, feeling a new strength within {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} body, and grins.
